abstract: An acquisition of Synthes would be among the biggest health care mergers in recent years and the largest ever by Johnson & Johnson.  Synthes confirmed it was in talks on Monday.
snippet: An acquisition of Synthes would be among the biggest health care mergers in recent years and the largest ever by Johnson & Johnson.  Synthes confirmed it was in talks on Monday.
lead_paragraph: Christian Hartmann/ReutersSurgical power tools made by Synthes, a Swiss-American company.

headline.main: J.&J. in Deal Talks With Synthes

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
